subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Cardinals’ Albert Pujols, who led the majors in home runs this year, has not had a homer in 85 at-bats, the longest homerless streak in his career.
snippet: The Cardinals’ Albert Pujols, who led the majors in home runs this year, has not had a homer in 85 at-bats, the longest homerless streak in his career.
